item.title: Giving voice to the the voiceless: Animal Equalityâ€™s Global Fight for Farmed Animals
item.author: Animal Equality
item.description: Founded in Spain in 2006, Animal Equality is now a global leader in defending farmed animals, using investigations, corporate reform and public action to expose cruelty and drive lasting change.
